about_the_game: This is a VR education software that requires the user to own a VR device and use it.Astronomy is a science that is filled with new discoveries. In the science and technology and novel theory, driven by the study of the universe constantly changing our understanding of the universe. We are pleased to have the opportunity to create such a section for the majority of users understand the universe looks like a software. The software presents some representative examples of today's astronomy known facts, evolving ideas and cutting-edge hairlines.
detailed_description: This is a VR education software that requires the user to own a VR device and use it.Astronomy is a science that is filled with new discoveries. In the science and technology and novel theory, driven by the study of the universe constantly changing our understanding of the universe. We are pleased to have the opportunity to create such a section for the majority of users understand the universe looks like a software. The software presents some representative examples of today's astronomy known facts, evolving ideas and cutting-edge hairlines.
developers: 上海永乐数码科技股份有限公司
name: Starry Makino

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7、win8、win10
  • Processor: Intel i3-7100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

publishers: 上海永乐数码科技股份有限公司
short_description: The universe is full of unknown and magical for mankind. At present, our understanding of the gorgeous universe is mainly derived from the study of the invisible universe, the vast sky, the mysterious constellation, the beautiful aurora phenomenon, all show the infinite charm of the universe.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
